# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

K = int(input())
S = input()

if K >= len(S):
    print(S)
else:
    print(S[:K] + '...')

n = int(input())
if n % 2 == 1:
    print("Weird")
elif n % 2 == 0 and n in range(2, 6):
    print("Not Weird")
elif n % 2 == 0 and n in range(6, 21):
    print("Weird")
elif n % 2 == 0 and n > 20:
    print("Not Weird")

K = int(input())
S = input()

if len(S) > K:
    print(S[:K] + "...")
else:
    print(S)


k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')
